title: Global smart augmented reality glasses revenue 2016 to 2022
summary: This statistic represents U.S. Revenue generated with online apparel and augmented retail sales between 2016 and 2022 .
In 2017 , retail e-commerce revenues from apparel and augmented sales amounted to 409.67 million U.S. dollars and are projected to increase 19718.88 million U.S. dollars in 2022 .

E-commerce Revenue from apparel in the U.S. – additional information With retail e-commerce sales worldwide expected to reach just over four million U.S. dollars in 2019 , the global e-commerce industry appears to show no signs of slowing down .
